co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch

Interface SparkPluginContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BatchContext, DatasetContext, LookupProvider, StageContext, TransformContext

    @Beta
public interface SparkPluginContext
extends BatchContext
    Context passed to spark plugin types during prepare run phase.

    • Method Summary

      void setSparkConf(org.apache.spark.SparkConf sparkConf)
